ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Van Allen Probe A High Resolution DC Electric Field in UVW Coordinates

RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata

Added DOI and PublicationInfo minted by LFB, updated InformationURL URLs as needed, updated the SPDF MetadataContact Person to Robert M. Candey, metadata updated to SPASE 2.4.1, reviewed by LFB 20220818

ResourceHeader.Description: This data set contains high-resolution DC Electric Field data in UVW coordinates as measured by the Electric Field and Waves Suite (EFW) onboard Van Allen Probe A. As a reference for spin axis vector in GSE, there was no spinning-frame offset removal.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: NASA Space Physics Data Facility (SPDF) CDAWeb.

Parameter.Name: Hires E-field
Parameter.Description: High Resolution DC Electric Field in UVW Coordinates.
Parameter.Caveats: High Resolution DC Electric Field in UVW Coordinates.

Parameter.Name: Hires E-field
Parameter.Description: High Resolution DC Electric Field in UVW Coordinates (No spinning-frame offset removal).
Parameter.Caveats: High Resolution DC Electric Field in UVW Coordinates (No spinning-frame offset removal).

Parameter.Name: Configuration (HSK) timetags, UTC
Parameter.Caveats: Configuration timetags. Used for BEB and DFB config values.

Parameter.Name: EFW BEB Configuration
Parameter.Description: EFW Boom Electronics Board (BEB) configuration code (on-board sensor biases
Parameter.Caveats: Indicates the configuration of the EFW Boom Electronics Board (BEB). Encodes the following information: for each sensor, sensor current bias, usher and guard voltage bias. See EFW-FAQ (http://rbsp.space.umn.edu/efw_faq.html) for a detailed description of the mapping between code value and instrument configuration (not crucial for L2 data interpretation)..

Parameter.Name: EFW DFB Configuration
Parameter.Description: EFW Digital Fields Board (DFB) Configuration code (on-board spectral and waveform processing configuration)
Parameter.Caveats: Indicates the configuration of the EFW Digital Filter Board (DFB). Encodes the following information: assignment of analog input channels to the various on-board spectral processors (FBK, SPEC, XSPEC); parameters of the on-board B-field-aligned data processing; nominal or contingency multiplexer programming. See EFW-FAQ (http://rbsp.space.umn.edu/efw_faq.html) for a detailed description of the mapping from code value to instrument configuration (not crucial for L2 data interpretation)..

Parameter.Name: Time, UTC
Parameter.Caveats: The elements of efw_qual are determined on a fixed cadence regardless of the nominal cadence of the individual L2 data products, and epoch_qual provides storage for those fixed-cadence time tags..

Parameter.Name: EFW Data Quality Flags
Parameter.Description: EFW quality array (global estimate of EFW data quality, plus 13 underlying observatory and instrument-level data quality factors)
Parameter.Caveats: The quality of EFW data products can be affected by a variety of observatory and instrument-level conditions. efw_qual is a collection of flags that show the estimate of each of these contributors over time. ..See the EFW-FAQ (http://rbsp.space.umn.edu/efw_faq.html) for a detailed description of the determination and meaning of each of the elements of efw_qual...If the value of a particular element of efw_qual is not relevant to the quality of a particular data product, it shall receive the value EFW_QUAL_NR (typ. -2)...If the value of a particular element of efw_qual is relevant to the quality of a particular data product but is not known at the time lf L2 data production, it shall receive the value EFW_QUAL_DUNNO (typ. -1)...A quality value of EFW_QUAL_GOOD (typ. 0) indicates that there are no known issues with the data product due to that particular element of efw_qual...The quality values are meant to be conservative, and values other than EFW_QUAL_GOOD should lead the user back to a member of the EFW instrument team for discussion and advice on the nature of the data quality as needed..

Parameter.Name: EFW Quality Flags Components
Parameter.Description: Component numbers for EFW data quality flags, efw_qual..

Parameter.Name: L_vector
Parameter.Caveats: Angular momentum/spin axis direction of spacecraft spin, namely, the sunward pointing direction of spacecraft spin axis.
